/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with lush green trees that provide a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the sun. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light.
